parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The token required to obtain more results. This parameter is not required in the first query. If a query does not return all results, you can specify the token returned from the previous query for the next query to obtain more results.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. You can call the DescribeRegions operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description:
The instance ID. You can specify a maximum of **50** instance IDs.****

>  You must specify at least one of the **ResourceId** and **Key** parameters.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The type of the resource. Set the value to **INSTANCE**.
